attributes.action: Legislate to force all stores/petrol filling stations and all other service outlets to accept payment by any legal method e.g. credit card,debit card or cheque.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is an increasing trend for service outlets to refuse to accept cheques for payment for goods or services even when backed with a Bank Card.The reason given appears to be that cheques are more susceptible to fraud than credit/debit cards.This is obviously open to challenge.
The use of debit or credit cards only,is quite likely to lead to increased charges for example--which already is the case for some transactions such as the payment for holidays.
